extendedInfo.description: Wanna scare your friends & loved ones suddenly ?Then this is the app you all are looking for. This app has one great function that no scary sound app have i.e the timer/alarm for the scary sounds you want to play and scare your friends suddenly..!!Yes this app contains above 20 different Scary and creepy sounds like:- DRAGON SOUND- HOUNDS OF HELL- MONSTER LAUGH- SINISTER LAUGH- TRANSYLVANIA OWL & TRANSYLVANIA FROGS- WITCH CACKLE- POLTERGEIST- PLAYFUL GHOSTSJust press and hold the Skull button to play the sound or loop sound or You can also click on top center loop button to play particular sound.Just click on "Set Timer" and set the timer to play the sounds you want to play while your friend is sleeping.On Timer Setting page click on options/menu button on your phone to know more about how to use the timer.Please click on the ads to help us earning so we can continue the development and provide you the free apps!CAUTION: PLEASE DO NOT USE THIS APP IF YOU ARE LIGHT HEARTED AND DO NOT SCARE YOUR FRIENDS WHO ARE LIGHT HEARTED. WE TAKE NO RESPONSIBILITY TO ANYTHING HAPPEN TO YOU/YOUR FRIENDS AFTER USING THIS APP.About permissions:All permissions related to location and internet are required for the Advertisements. We do not collect any personal information.Tags:Scary ringtone, horror, scary sounds, scream ringtones,Best Scary, halloween
